description:
InvalidSharedStorage should not be used both in shared and non-shared live migration.
And its message is wrong.
title: exception used in  check_can_live_migrate_source is wrong

comments.content: InvalidSharedStorage should not be used both in shared and non-shared live migration

Branch:    master

commit f94391fb41b42909ae9508ed54316199fccfe41d
Author: Jian Wen <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Aug 29 22:29:25 2012 +0800

    Add a new exception for live migration.
    
    Raises new exception InvalidLocalStorage instead of
    InvalidSharedStorage when block migration is used with shared storage.
    Corrects the message of InvalidSharedStorage.
    
    Fixes bug 1043165
    
    Change-Id: I68bfac3f89276edc38c00ca963911fe07456dc0d
